frontmatter.title: Move keyboard cursor by pressing down (Force Touch) on the keyboard
frontmatter.description: This might be easier than trying to pinpoint a specific character

frontmatter.title: Reveal keyboard shortcuts by pressing down and holding the Command Key
frontmatter.description: Works across many supported apps on iOS 14

frontmatter.title: Show previously closed tabs by tapping and holding the New Tab icon
frontmatter.description: Saves time when you accidentally close a tab
